name: Monkey Rush
description: Dive into adventure with the main character Maka, immerse yourself in beautiful worlds and defeat all the enemies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core 2 duo (support SSE2) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3) Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core i3 (support SSE2) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3) Storage: 150 MB available space
